description:
A battle rages over Shinjuku while Momoyo and Takae fight for supremacy. Unfortunately for Momoyo, Saki lurks in the background, giving Momoyo the upper hand. Luckily Yamato jumps in to help even the odds. But things don`t go quite as planned...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go at It with Me, Seriously!!
Maji de Watashi to Butsukari Nasai!!
真剣で私とぶつかりなさい!!
